entry.title: Montecito Body Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dirty Bee
Type: Bath & Body
Price: 17.99

Dirty Bee | Body Oil

Montecito- Blend of Freesia, Floral , and Citrus. Best SELLER!

Body oil helps to lock moisture into your skin for hours. It penetrates your skin’s protective barrier and helps maintain a radiant glow throughout the day. To maximize the amount of moisture your skin retains, remember to cleanse and exfoliate your skin before you apply body oil. Let the oil to soak in for two - three minutes before getting dressed. This way your skin stays moisturized and your clothes stay grease free.

  • Actively helps fade stretch marks.
  • Helps Skin Retain Moisture.
  • By massaging your skin with body oils, you can help to improve your overall health by reducing aches and pains and decreasing stress.
  • Coconut Oil: provides deep moisture without making your skin oily.
  • Red Raspberry Seed Oil: A great source of antioxidants and vitamins A and E, red raspberry seed oil can slow the aging process, stimulate collagen production, and help your skin appear more youthful and vibrant.

Key Information about our Body Oils:

  • Travel Friendly
  • 100% Vegan
  • Animal Cruelty-Free
  • Reusable Container
  • Mother Nature Approved
  • Gluten Free

Ingredients: Fractionated Coconut Oil, Rice Bran Oil, Jojoba Oil, Red Raspberry Seed Oil, Baobab Oil, Fragrance

Made in USA
